Measure Velocity change
=======================
Script to measure seismic velocity changes from ambient noise correlation functions. Called as a
python program the script accepts the path to a `yaml <http://yaml.org>`_
parameter file, reads it and calls the :func:`~miic.scripts.measure_velocity_change.measure_velocity_change` function with these parameters.

The structure of the parameter file and the functionality of the script are
described in the following tutorial :ref:`basics_correlation_tutorial` and :ref:`measure_velocity_change_tutorial`.
